name: PRICE
description: The hero Ivry wakes up from a nightmare and finds himself in a weird room. To escape from fear and darkness, he has to search and explore on his own until he discovers the truth and finds his sister Iva.

reviews.review_text: DONT play this game after midnight with your music volume turned up high. Seriously, the doll singing got me real hard, i had goosebumps throughout the game.

Its hard to write something about PRICE when the game is short and intriguing with story.  Well first things first. You should try this game despite liking riddles, or not. These are generally short here and even if a little chaotic worth figuring out on your own. Art is gorgeous aswell as animation. There was a lot of effort in such small experience. One exception is repetive music.  Story well... I wished it was longer! Since I was already getting something from character development. *BAM IT ENDS*. You know especially when there are things staying on the back of mind unexplained. Game is mysterious and doesnt let go of that feeling, even after end. Next time I hope for a bigger project in same idea of puzzle-horror-adventure. Since they know how to make atmosphere. I would be glad to pay for something more than just 2 levels.

I thought it was impossible without a guide (probably because they decided to remove cutscenes that gave hints for some reason) and was a little creepy-er compared to my non-horror game library. Other that that it was fantastic! A true spooky game that doesn't cheat with jump scares, just pure creepy-ness.  Well guess what? They added the cutsences back in! Hazah!

I want to recommend this game, I really do... It has amazing music (except they play 1 song on repeat), great art, and a fairly decent story.  But the puzzles... Awkward clue combinations that make no sense. Clicking on every possible item to get a reaction. Unobvious clickable areas (looking at you 3 drawer dresser). Missing cutscenes (codec issues? -- fixed by developer, as noted in comments). And the game ends, then you click Start to continue it. That's just confusing and needless.  I would have really enjoyed this game, if I didn't spend all my time switching back and forth between playing and the discussion thread.  But, by all means... It's free, go for it. But be ready to be annoyed.  Sidenotes: I didn't realize there were achievements, I didn't even notice the popup. Easy 100% Definitely buying the OST
This game is a short-but-sweet story-driven adventure game with no survival elements. It has more tragedy to it than horror, but there's plenty of gruesome macabre if that's your jam.

While the game is missing the cutscenes when in english, other users have generously posted videos of them with translations if you want to view them. The game has a rich story which I thouroughly enjoyed, just the right amount of creepiness. As I write this, I just finished the game, and I can say it left me with goosebumps, especially when the true ending is revealed in the second part. The opening song is phenominal, I actually am thinking of buying the dlc just so I can download it. I recommend this game, and I wish there were others from the makers.

The atmospere is very creepy... Yet it's calming....or maybe it's just the music that calms me. PRICE has an interesting story. It's not all gameplay, there are some animations, too. Try out this game if you want a relaxing game once a while.
'There is no place for one who lingers about.'
I really recommend this little free game. Simple but with a nice little story and beautiful art. Translation to English is not perfect, but it's good enough to enjoy the game.
Great little puzzler, some of the puzzles are a bit tricky or confusing at first, but simply performing trial and error seems to pull through in the end.
It's a free game, with an interesting story and an interesting music. But it's short and easy. But like I said.... it's Free! So enjoy an hour of puzzles... FOR FREE! What more do you want xD
this game is just.... don t have sens (to me)

8/10    would resurrect again     Only noticeable problem I had was that the audio wouldn't save to the selected settings. I also didn't realize you had to 'equip' the items in the inventory to use them on the objects in the room.
Hey.. I'm stuck on the first part where Ivry is in Iva's room, with the drawer with the code on it.. Does anybody know the code?

This is a point and click horror game. You are a guy in the ruined room of your sister. Figure out what is going on. The music is good, the visual are stunning for a free game. It is texted in english atleast and the grammar is far from the worst I have seen (sorry about my own poor grammar). The courser changes when you hover over something you can click on. The little girl singing made me angry and the game wasn't really scary in my opinion.  I don't know if it is good for an point and click game since I usually don't play this type of game. The changing courser makes the game easy enough without giving you the answers and it has some acheivements but not cards. So if a point and click horror game that is not the scariest sounds like something for you then try it, it is free anyways so why not try it. Have fun, enjoy and clean the rooms :)
nice artwork, but the game broke on me in the second room, not stuck, literally broke. and the saves got corrupted.  the singing doll its really annoying, good you can turn music off.

Oh my god this game has incredible production value - better than games I've spent 10/15 dollars on.  It's short but so, so good. The art, music, writing, voice acting - VOICE ACTING in a FREE GAME? It's crazytown bananapants and I loved it, it's awesome, please play it.

I finished the game and it's worth your time. The dark and mysterious atmosphere it's very well made. The music it's beautiful and helps a lot to get into the game. Also, the animation is smooth and good.  The plot is genuine and I really enjoyed it. I didn't have any problems with the game crashing or something. The only bad thing, for me because I would want it to continue playing, is that it is short.
This game is pretty dank. good story and plot if i could play again i would. 10/10 IGN
Short and cool
I really enjoyed it! The design, soundtrack and the story are very immersive, I definetelly recommend it. I hope a sequence will come someday :)
I actually liked this game and was surprised at how good it was for being free to play. I would like to see what they come up with next.

This is the kind of game that reminds you that art is something that touches your soul. It is not necesarry for a game to have the biggest budget, or the highest market value, but when it tells a story there is something to be said for that. Really worth the play, easily beat in around an hour if slow and is compelling for longer.

Dripping with style and definitely worth spending the hour with it. It tells a sad story about a brother and sister who are a bit too close to one another. Aspects of it are a bit vague due to the translation, particularly the after credits sequence, but it's very interesting, and I'd love to see more from the developer.

Short, free, creepy, with beautiful music and art. Quite frankly it could've gotten away with crappy music and art considering the price (badum tsh) but the fact that those aspects are so polished is just the icing on top. Price is a point and click adventure game, with some of the same problems of the old point and click adventure games including lots of clicking on everything and trying to use every object you collected on everything else. But it's still a simple game with a pretty good horror story to go with it. No jump scares, just that sort of creeping dread you find in a nightmare. Personally I much prefer that type of more psychological horror to begin with. And it's free. Come on, I would've paid MONEY for this game and you can play it free so go do it.
An excellent and sadly tale,like it.
Masterpiece, but rather difficult

Great music, interesting creepy story line, two parts with one unlocked by the other. Being free especially I was very happy with it! Its a bit short and not too too difficult to figure out, but again its free and the music and story is pretty good so it makes up for it.

I really liked the story, however I had to look up a walkthrough for certain parts. some of the hints are not very clear. Not to spoil anything but the middle drawer in the first room stumped me to the point of rage quiting. I have sence complited the game. and I have to say that overall the game is not bad. although item mangment could be better.
I LOVED this game. The puzzles are super fun and I like the story. Pretty art and I'm sad It's so short. Wish it was longer but other than that It's great!

As the majority of the others, yes, this game is great, and I'd recommend it.[h1/] The game has nice art, nice music, it's all good.  Although that the game is pretty hard to beat, but it's a rather short game on the other hand.   I've seen people finding the ending lackluster, and I can see the reason as to why.  Infact, I know why.[/b]  The original translations of the game actually have more cutscenes than our english translation version on steam, which actually adds quite the story and explains a lot as well.  It's quite a problem for those who want to actually understand the story better, as that our current english version looks like a cheese with holes.   On and all, I just hope people who made this game actually notices this issue, and I hope that it'll be fixed soon. For the sake of the enjoyment of the english players.

A really great game with an unique art style, good gameplay and a great storyline that is almost like a dark fairytale. I was really impressed how well done the graphics and the cutscences were, especially because this game is for free.  With only an hour or two of gameplay, this game is really short but it knows how to tell a good and closed story with the right amount of mystery and a little bit of creppiness.  The puzzles were fine as well, not that easy and not too difficult, so you can enjoy the story without checking a guide every second ;).  Furthermore, I really like the flow of the story, how the mystery is building and how the character learns the truth bit for bit. This small adventure has also a sad (and a little bit creppy) but beautiful soundtrack, I loved how perfect it matched with the atmosphere and the storyline. So if you like a little puzzle-game with a creppy but moreover really great presented story (the visuals are more than fantastic), give it a shot, you definitely won't regret it.   Hope to see more games like this from the developers, and I wouldn't mind to pay for this quality :).

This game is really great! Free to play and if you were really smart at games like this you can finish this within an hour, but I wasn't so took me 2 hours... But still great game overall, the soundtrack you will hear might be annoying but I just find that to suit the game, the art and beautiful, the chinese dubbing was good to, and the storyline is very very...

I heard about this game back when it was orignally released, so when I learned that there was an English version available, I jumped at the chance to play it. The music and art are fantastic, especially considering that this game is free. The story was certainly interesting, and even though the English was a little off at times, it didn't detract from the story. Definately would recommend this if you like horror or atmospheric stuff!
Well I played like 25 mins to understand that, this game isn't for me, 2HARD4ME. But it has a nice storyline, something like a Video Novel.

It's rare to find a free game on steam that is so well done. The puzzles are challenging, the story is amazing and the music is excellent. Issues with missing cutscenes that may detract from the story but theres a walkthrough somewhere that has links to the cutscenes.
I love this game so much,the art style and music are just amazing!
Nice story line but too short :(

If you're into horror and point & click games then you'll definitely enjoy P.R.I.C.E.  What really makes this short game shine is the incredible hand-drawn art and the fantastic music. You won't regret it. Hopefully Yetu Games will give us more games like this one in the near future. ^^

A hidden gem in steam worth playing it.   Happy i found this little gem ;)

Normally, a game this short would get a negative review. If it were any less well-written and done, it wouldn't have been enough to want more. But it was, and it is. I wish there was more.  That aside, it's a very interesting, deep, dark story, even if brief.  Also, the music. <3  There's two things that did bother me, but I'm probably just crazy: 1. The voice audio didn't quite match the music and sound effects audio. It was like it was part of something different and added in.... 2. The mish-mash of languages. The audio was Chinese(?), the subtitles and in-between scenes written in English, the music varied but noticably some Latin, and the writing during the scenes switched between English and German.
